attributes.action: Abolish mandatory CMS payments to parents unlawfully restricting access.
attributes.additional_details: We want to abolish mandatory cms payments to any parent who is unlawfully restricting child parent contact. We believe this will dramatically impact the amount of family court hearings in the U.K and in turn dramatically reduce Goverment spending in this area.
attributes.background: We are asking for a bill to be passed to abolishing mandatory CMS payments to any parent who unlawfully restricts child parent access to opposing parent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616502
